title: The Damned (band)
summary: The Damned are an English rock band formed in London in 1976 by lead vocalist Dave Vanian, guitarist Brian James, bassist (and later guitarist) Captain Sensible, and drummer Rat Scabies.[1] They were the first punk rock band from the United Kingdom to release a single, "New Rose" (1976),[4] release an album, Damned Damned Damned (1977),[5] and tour the United States.[6] They have nine singles that charted on the UK Singles Chart Top 40.[7]
